attributes.action: 1 week menstrual leave for women in school and at work
attributes.background: Give women 1 week off school and work.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you would like women who menstruate to have time off but it is unclear if you want this to be monthly, annually or any other allocation of time, and in what context the time off can be taken.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
